parameters:
\!
I am Maritus, Lady Lyra's butler, as you may recall.
Lady Lyra is ready for you now.
\lsoffThere's a rectangular indentation on this altar...
\lsoffReturn \N[1] to the pedestal and retrieve her soulgem?

\lsoffAs the golem returned to its pedestal, the last party member clattered to the ground as a motionless soulgem...
